      • computeSafeBrake

        protected double computeSafeBrake()
        Computes the minimum safe braking distance for a train, given its Speed.
        Returns:
        is the minimum safe braking distance for the train in question, or -1 if the train is null; NOTE: Could also simply return void and update the train.

      • computeSafeSpeed

        protected double computeSafeSpeed()
        Computes the maximum safe speed for a train, given an authority.
        Returns:
        is the maximum safe speed for the train in question, or -1 if the train is null; NOTE: Could also simply return void and update the train.

      • getPower

        public double getPower()
        Computes the necessary power at which to set a train, given an authority.
        Specified by:
        getPower in interface TrainControllerInterface
        Returns:
        is the power to which the train should be set. If negative, represents number of seconds brake should be applied. NOTE: Could also simply return void and update the train.

      • setLights

        protected boolean setLights(boolean on)
        Commands the Train in question to turn their lights on or off.
        Parameters:
        on - is true if the lights should be on, and false if the lights should be off.
        Returns:
        true if the lights are on, false if not.

      • setDoors

        protected byte setDoors(boolean leftOpen,
                        boolean rightOpen)
        Commands the Train in question to open their right or left doors.
        Parameters:
        leftOpen - is true if the left doors should be opened (or remain open); false if the doors should be closed (or remain closed).
        rightOpen - is true if the right doors should be opened (or remain open); false if the doors should be closed (or remain closed).
        Returns:
        status; 0 if both are closed; 1 if only right is open; 2 if only left is open; 3 if both are open.

      • setDoors

        protected byte setDoors(int status)

        protected boolean justStop()
        Bring the train to a complete stop regardless of circumstances as quickly as safely possible.
        Returns:
        status of variable stop

        Returns:
